title: Stream: Red Hot Chili Peppers – I’m With You
content:
Regardless of whether you think they’re past-it cock-rockers or one of the world’s greatest bands, the Red Hot Chili Peppers are back with their tenth studio album ‘I’m With You’ and seem to have been rejuvenated by the arrival of new guitarist and long-time friend, Josh Klinghoffer.

The new 14 track record is released on 29th August but is currently streaming in full on American Radio site 91x.com. Below is the track-listing and the URL to listen.

1. Monarchy of Roses
2. Factory of Faith
3. Brendan’s Death Song
4. Ethiopia
5. Annie Wants a Baby
6. Look Around
7. The Adventures of Rain Dance Maggie
8. Did I Let You Know
9. Goodbye Hooray
10. Happiness Loves Company
11. Police Station
12. Even You Brutus?
13. Meet Me at the Corner
14. Dance, Dance, Dance

To cast your judgements on the album click the link (If link is not working, then it is due to a fault with the 91x.com site, which is undergoing site maintenance.)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d49
